body:
Title says it all.
Goodbye.
Thanks for all the support and all my friends.
I'm done with not just Avicus, but with Minecraft in general.
People I would like to thank the most:

SnowSX3:
Snow, Thanks for everything mate. I don't know how much I could thank you. You motivated me to achieve being a staff member. Even though I didn't succeed, Thanks.

Petlas:
Even though we weren't the closest friends, we still had fun in game. Thanks for that.

FrozenSolstice/Elsa:
We had so much fun in game. I was the only one in Avicus to open up to you tbh :P

Assley:
You are the funniest person on the planet! Don;t stop being funny either. Please make everyone laugh everyday like you did to me.

FrostedCupcakez:
Even though you had mixed feelings about me such as thinking I was cool to hating me, Thanks for the humorous moderating you did :P.

_xToebeanII:
Iv'e known you for the longest time. You were the funniest walls player I knew. You wouldn't kill people you would have fun in Walls. Thanks for being such a great friend.

Assassins:
Thanks for everything. All of you teammates have been great to me! Even though I couldn't scrim with you guys, the team chat in Skype was hilarious. Great Team!

And anyone else, I love you too.
Goodbye Avicus.


R.I.P
Aidan

R.I.P

Good luck with whatever you plan to do in the future. =)
